root.title: Summary
root.pass_text:
Congratulations you have passed the assessment!

Here you can add further information for the learner in the case where they pass the module.
root.fail_text:
Oh no, you didn't quite pass the assessment.

Here you can add further information for the learner in the case where they did not pass the module.
root.button_heading: What would you like to do next?
root.summary_title: This is the end of the module
root.directors_tip:
Here you can give further information to the learner wether they passed the module or not. Generally this section is used for further learning or what to do next.

There is an option to display the score of the learner as a pecentage or as a ratio.
